article_text: Redistricting in 2011 moved Brent Lasater into the 20th District, and he ran for that seat in 2012, losing to Democrat John Mayfield by fewer than 200 votes out of 15,000 votes cast.

article_metadata.news-keywords: news, election, Missouri, House, 20th District, Brent Lasater. Bill E. Kidd
